title: A Worrisome Pattern Re-emerges in Seeking Response From Republicans
description: A big challenge for some pollsters, nonresponse bias, appears to be back.
dc:creator: Nate Cohn
media:credit: Hilary Swift for The New York Times
media:description: Trump supporters tend not to be shy about showing their support with signs, as this yard in Levant, Maine, suggested in 2020. But they can be more reluctant to engage with a pollster.
